details.description: You need a licence to use sound recordings for on-stage or off-stage effects
details.licence_short_description: Licence to use sound recordings for on-stage or off-stage effects.
details.licence_overview:
To use sound recordings for on-stage or off-stage effects, you are likely to need a licence from [Phonographic Performance Limited (PPL).](http://www.ppluk.com/ "Phonographic Performance Limited (PPL)"){:rel="external"} A licence from [PRS for Music](http://www.prsformusic.com/Pages/default.aspx "PRS for Music"){:rel="external"} may also be required.

You may also need a PRS for Music licence - but not a PPL licence - if you are playing live music during a performance.

*[PPL]: Phonographic Performance Limited
